title: so people are saying  that assasins are trash and mages are good rigth now
body:
what just happened?4 months ago people are bitching complaying about  champions like {{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:7}}  and saying that they deserved to be nerfed to oblivion and mages need to be buffed riot ears then and done what they wanted now the community is complaing that assasins are trash and mages are op and that assasins deserve to be buffed......
im dont undestand these people

replies.body: It's almost like the people who play this game aren't a monolithic hivemind and instead are formed by individuals with distinct tastes and standpoints...
its less about people tastes and standpoinrs and more about the ciclejekring
Calling opinions you don't share "ciclejerking" might seem like a clever way to discredit them, but it's a rather dishonest tactic.

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2016-11-14T01:35:45.175+0000)
>
> Calling opinions you don't share "ciclejerking" might seem like a clever way to discredit them, but it's a rather dishonest tactic.

''Calling opinions you don't share "ciclejerking" might seem like a clever way to discredit them, but it's a rather dishonest tactic.''  -Hello im an a guy who use very long words  just  to make people think that im an intelligent but cant undestand the fact that those persons ''opinions'' are not more then complains that change depending on certain things and also  those same  people Do not know how to form a  opinion on their own and need someone to talk about what they should think about it  and also that opinion is a true fact in they logic
I'm sure this sounded really witty in your head, but it's just roundabout and awkward. 2/10, use less words next time.

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=00020001000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T02:28:51.390+0000)
>
> I'm sure this sounded really witty in your head, but it's just roundabout and awkward. 2/10, use less words next time.

-10/10 you dint use long words in you comment
Actually "roundabout" is longer than any other I've used in the other post. I see you do as well at math as you do at being witty.

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=0002000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-17T07:40:04.765+0000)
>
> Actually "roundabout" is longer than any other I've used in the other post. I see you do as well at math as you do at being witty.

roundabout only have 10 words needs more -69/10
Letters, my friend, not words. 10 letters.

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=000200010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-17T18:53:01.113+0000)
>
> Letters, my friend, not words. 10 letters.

did you just Corrected me? -8999/10

I'm perfectly willing to overlook the horrid capitalization and punctuation, but not understanding the difference between letters and words is a step beyond. People seeing it would start mocking you and implying you're not very bright. Which is obviously accurate, but still not nice. I can't let that happen, better that you're corrected by someone who cares about you and mean you well than ridiculed by random strangers.

<3

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=00020001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-18T05:23:40.783+0000)
>
> I'm perfectly willing to overlook the horrid capitalization and punctuation, but not understanding the difference between letters and words is a step beyond. People seeing it would start mocking you and implying you're not very bright. Which is obviously accurate, but still not nice. I can't let that happen, better that you're corrected by someone who cares about you and mean you well than ridiculed by random strangers.
> 
> <3

okay you have a point im will give a 6/10

Kat, Rengar, and Kha zix are really the only assassins that stand out this patch in terms of being too strong. Maybe fizz too?

I was on the fence with Kat, but after seeing Voyboy's recent video with Kat top-lane vs a Renekton, holy shiiiiit. You know you have a problem when a squishy meelee assassin is out-trading a Renekton

> [{quoted}](name=Xatos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-15T20:29:46.843+0000)

 any squishy meelen champion can win agaisnt a renekton if they are really good or the renekton is really dumb ps:also you forgot about these ones -->{{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:35}}

Wait wut? I thought we were talking about the champions that were part of the assassin rework. Diana, eve, riven, and noct don't relate then. Diana, riven and noct aren't even primary assassins. They're main role is fighter/diver or something

Ekko is the same just more ap oriented. Idk about shaco. Zed is arguably the same just more quality of life and has to try harder to get his AD steroid.

I'm on the fence with Talon. I see him banned a lot, even in high elo streams, but a lot of people say he's garbage. Idk anymore what is life

> [{quoted}](name=Xatos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T00:22:13.588+0000)

> Ekko is the same just more ap oriented. Idk about shaco. Zed is arguably the same just more quality of life and has to try harder to get his AD steroid.
> 
> I'm on the fence with Talon. I see him banned a lot, even in high elo streams, but a lot of people say he's garbage. Idk anymore what is life

wait  why you think riven,diana and noc are figthers? 85% of the time they build full glass cannon if expecialy diana

They're listed as fighters, well except nocturne. They can burst like an assassin, but Diana has to commit and has no escapes, while Riven has sorta drawn out combos to get full DPS out. It's hard to tell the difference because they are secondary assassins as well, but there's a reason why Riven is a better top laner than Kha Zix for example. They're bursty fighters.

Noct on the other hand is listed as assassin, but I don't reeeeeally consider him a true assassin because usually you have to build bruiser style unless you're super fed. Otherwise Noct as no escapes and just gets blown up.

> [{quoted}](name=Xatos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T21:36:53.741+0000)
>
> They're listed as fighters, well except nocturne. They can burst like an assassin, but Diana has to commit and has no escapes, while Riven has sorta drawn out combos to get full DPS out. It's hard to tell the difference because they are secondary assassins as well, but there's a reason why Riven is a better top laner than Kha Zix for example. They're bursty fighters.
> 
> Noct on the other hand is listed as assassin, but I don't reeeeeally consider him a true assassin because usually you have to build bruiser style unless you're super fed. Otherwise Noct as no escapes and just gets blown up.

diana if im remenber she have a stun and a reset on her ult and noc  have a shield that blocks everything and also a fear they all have things that help then not necessary mobility
Why are riven and ahri in this number? they are currently one of the strongest laners atm lel and still deserve nerfs ^^
except half of them? ok...

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T00:51:35.467+0000)

> except half of them? ok...
 
im dont know what rock you are smoking but from what im heard 7 is not the half of 48
I can beat nearly all top laners with Riven and every single mid laner with Ahri... so do tell me more...

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T18:29:33.445+0000)
>
> I can beat nearly all top laners with Riven and every single mid laner with Ahri... so do tell me more...

You do?thats great would you like a cookie?anyway idk if you lying,if you face a bunch of shit players in the top lane or you are a riven main with 1 billion mastery points she gets easily countered by most of the champions in the top lane and doesnt matter what you think about her it will just take one good darius or illaioi player to stomp a riven main

I don't play AD champs, I don't play champions like riven. But I play her in rare cases, no matter how "shit" as you call them, they are... I'm literally a baby compared to the majority of top lane players while I play Riven. And the fact I got fed in 19 out of my 21 riven games, is enough to say what a good and "weak" champion she is.

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6LBKUOxX,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-15T23:36:57.436+0000)

 ''And the fact I got fed in 19 out of my 21 riven games, is enough to say what a good and "weak" champion she is'' im not syaing that riven is bad im saying that she is not a good pick because most of the top laners destroy and about you get fed in 19 out of 21 in you riven games its probaly because you faced a bunch of shit players
Plat in a nuttshell I'd say then
